BUTTON.SCRIPT: local wndDrop = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_DROP") if wndDrop:IsNil() == false then if UISelf:GetParent():GetSize():GetY() == 24 then UISelf:GetParent():SetSize(Point2(90, 212)) wndDrop:SetSize(Point2(85,171)) wndDrop:Visible(true) else wndDrop:Visible(false) UISelf:GetParent():SetSize(Point2(90, 24)) wndDrop:SetSize(Point2(85,0)) end end

FORM.SCRIPT:
UI_SHOPBTN_OnFocus(UISelf, 1) ChangeShopViewSubOrder("0")
local wndFilter = UISelf:GetControl("SFRM_SHOP"):GetControl("SFRM_ITEM_BG"):GetControl("SFRM_SDW"):GetControl("FRM_FILTER") if wndFilter:IsNil() == false then wndFilter:GetControl("BTN_FILTER"):SetStaticTextW(GetTextW(400167)) wndFilter:GetControl("SFRM_DROP"):Visible(false) end
local wndInv = GetUIWnd("Inv") if wndInv:IsNil() == true then CallUI("Inv") end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local wndDrop = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_DROP") if wndDrop:IsNil() == false then if UISelf:GetParent():GetSize():GetY() == 24 then UISelf:GetParent():SetSize(Point2(90, 166)) wndDrop:SetSize(Point2(85,125)) wndDrop:Visible(true) else wndDrop:Visible(false) UISelf:GetParent():SetSize(Point2(90, 24)) wndDrop:SetSize(Point2(85,0)) end end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("CBTN_VIEW_ICON"):LockClick(false) UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("CBTN_VIEW_ICON"):CheckState(false) UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_ICON"):Visible(false) UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("LST_LIST"):Visible(true) for i=0,35 do UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_ICON"..i):Visible(false) end

UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("CBTN_VIEW_LIST"):LockClick(false) UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("CBTN_VIEW_LIST"):CheckState(false) UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_ICON"):Visible(true) UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("LST_LIST"):Visible(false) for i=0,35 do UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_ICON"..i):Visible(true) end

FORM.SCRIPT:
UI_SHOPBTN_OnFocus(UISelf, 1) ChangeShopViewSubOrder("0")
local wndFilter = UISelf:GetControl("SFRM_SHOP"):GetControl("SFRM_ITEM_BG"):GetControl("SFRM_SDW"):GetControl("FRM_FILTER") if wndFilter:IsNil() == false then wndFilter:GetControl("BTN_FILTER"):SetStaticTextW(GetTextW(400167)) wndFilter:GetControl("SFRM_DROP"):Visible(false) end
local wndInv = GetUIWnd("Inv") if wndInv:IsNil() == true then CallUI("Inv") end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local digit = tonumber(UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_COLOR"):GetControl("SFRM_SDW"):GetControl("SFRM_DIGIT"):GetStaticText():GetStr()) if nil~=digit and digit > 0 then DoCalcuratorAction() UISelf:CloseParent() end return true
BUTTON.HOTKEY: local digit = tonumber(UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_COLOR"):GetControl("SFRM_SDW"):GetControl("SFRM_DIGIT"):GetStaticText():GetStr()) if nil~=digit and digit > 0 then DoCalcuratorAction() UISelf:CloseParent() end return true

local digit = tonumber(UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_COLOR"):GetControl("SFRM_SDW"):GetControl("SFRM_DIGIT"):GetStaticText():GetStr()) if nil~=digit and digit > 0 then DoCalcuratorAction() UISelf:CloseParent() end return true

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_TEXT_BG"):Visible(false) local btn = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("CBTN_TEXT") if false==btn:IsNil() then btn:CheckState(false) btn:LockClick(false) end UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true)

UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_TEXT_BG"):Visible(true) local btn = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("CBTN_TAB3") if false==btn:IsNil() then btn:CheckState(false) btn:LockClick(false) end UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true)

FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf kSelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(0) local iData = kSelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() kSelf:SetStaticText("1 ~ "..(iData+1)*30)
RegistUIAction(UISelf, "CloseUI") ChangeShopViewGroup(3) local wndInv = GetUIWnd("Inv") if wndInv:IsNil() == true then CallUI("Inv") end
CallJobSkillShop(UISelf) local kInv = GetUIWnd("Inv") if true == kInv:IsNil() then CallUI("Inv") end
local kSelf = UISelf kSelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) OnShopPageView(kSelf:GetParent(), 1) ShopPageNumSetting(kSelf:GetParent())
UI_SHOPBTN_OnFocus(UISelf, 1) ChangeShopViewSubOrder("0") local wndInv = GetUIWnd("Inv") if wndInv:IsNil() == true then CallUI("Inv") end
